item.title: Partitions for Everyone!

item.description: Kyle is on fire dissecting various databases behaviour during network partitions! Fun watch. Video Slides

item.title: TokuDB v.7 is opensourced!
item.author: roman.heinrich@gmail.com
item.description: Wow, great news, Tokudb is Open Source! Wow-wow-wow! Tokudb v7 is open source! Press-Release Sourcecode Technology Download Time to update my vagrant recipe to v.7!
